      • addBlankSpace

        public static void addBlankSpace(java.awt.Container contentPane,
                 int spaces)
        Adds a specified number of blank spaces to a container in the form of invisible labels. Intended to be used with the GridLayout layout manager when customizing the interface.
        Parameters:
        contentPane - Container which blank spaces will be added to
        spaces - Number of blank spaces to add.

      • toAmount

        public static long toAmount(java.lang.String price)
        Converts the String representation of a dollar amount into a long value representing that dollar amount as a quantity of pennies by checking for the index of the decimal place.
        Parameters:
        price - String to be converted to long value
        Returns:
        price parsed into long value

      • isMoney

        public static boolean isMoney(java.lang.String amount)
        Checks to see whether the given string is in dollar format
        Parameters:
        amount -
        Returns:
        true if String input can be given a dollar value, else false
